items.content_html: StormiDB is a lightweight, document-oriented database library that uses cloud object storage (Azure Blob Storage and S3-compatible) as its backend. It's designed for simplicity, scalability, and resilience.

items.content_html: Colorado is a lightweight, intuitive JavaScript library for handling and converting color values. Seamlessly switch between RGB and Hex formats with simple methods and generate clean string outputs for your web projects. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and dynamic color management solution.
